## Expectation.toBeRejected() method

Awaits the provided promise and expects it to be rejected. The error's class and message are also checked.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toBeRejected(this: Expectation<Promise<any>>, errorClass: Newable<Error>, message?: string): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  this | [Expectation](./earljs.expectation.md)<!-- -->&lt;Promise&lt;any&gt;&gt; |  |
|  errorClass | Newable&lt;Error&gt; | expected class of the thrown error. |
|  message | string | string or matcher to check the message against. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
